import BN from'bn.js';import{keccak_256}from'js-sha3';// Output is only u32, so can be a number
export function expand(randomValue,n){var hasher=keccak_256.create();hasher.update(new Uint8Array(randomValue));hasher.update(new BN(n).toArrayLike(Buffer,'le',4));return new BN(hasher.digest().slice(0,4),'le').toNumber();}
